alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 11:57PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Arapahoe and southeastern Adams Counties through 1245 AM MDT... At 1156 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Byers, or 36 miles southwest of Fort Morgan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Byers and Shamrock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
